sentences.english: Conclusion The above procedure is necessary for the ankle sprains with the injury of the common peroneal nerve.
sentences.chinese: 結論踝扭傷出現腓總神經損傷者應作探查鬆解減壓術。

sentences.english: Even ankle-high water, if it is moving, can make you fall.
sentences.chinese: 就算是及踝的水，只要是流動的，都可能讓你摔倒。

sentences.english: The main trend for shoes are ankle boots and over-the-knee boots.
sentences.chinese: 最流行的當屬及踝短靴和過膝長靴。

sentences.english: Objective To study the result of microsurgical repair of tissue defect in ankle or foot.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究踝足部組織缺損顯微外科修復的效果。

sentences.english: Medical massage is an effective treatment for Lumbar Sprain and Ankle Sprain.
sentences.chinese: 醫療按摩是治療腰扭傷和踝扭傷的行之有效的好方法。

sentences.english: The lengths of the skirts saw different levels, from the knee to the ankle.
sentences.chinese: 下裝的長度也有了不同的差別，從及膝到及踝不等。

sentences.english: Ankle sprains accounted for about half of all injuries.
sentences.chinese: 踝中心環節關頭扭傷約莫佔所有受傷環境的一半。

sentences.english: Adjustable buckle closure at ankle strap.
Ankle-high gladiator shoes with a calf-length dress is definitely a no-no.
sentences.chinese: 過膝長裙加及踝羅馬鞋絕對是時尚禁忌。

sentences.english: Then subluxate the talus and malleolus laterally to reach the joint surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 然後將距骨及內膘踝向外側半脫位，顯露關節面。

sentences.english: This dissection usually diides the anterolateral malleolar and lateral tarsal arteries.
sentences.chinese: 在此解剖過程中常會切斷踝前外側動脈和跗外側動脈。

sentences.english: The capitulum is inside the implantation fossa.
sentences.chinese: 踝狀突位於核後端的植入窩中。

sentences.english: Widening of the medial ankle mortise establishes the presence of a deltoid ligament tear.
sentences.chinese: 內側踝穴的增寬表明存在三角韌帶撕裂。

definition: ilium/outermost bone of the pelvic girdle/Taiwan pr. [ka4]
